alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:18AM CST until January 30 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Clarke Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 25.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday evening to a crest of 44.7 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
